org.turbogwt.core.http.client.serialization

Interface Serializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type it can serialize
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Serdes<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonBooleanSerdes, JsonNumberSerdes, JsonObjectSerdes, JsonSerdes, JsonStringSerdes, JsonValueSerdes, OverlaySerdes, VoidSerdes

    public interface Serializer<T>
    Performs serialization of types.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String serialize(T t, SerializationContext context)
      Serialize T to plain text.
      String serializeFromCollection(Collection<T> c, SerializationContext context)
      Serialize a collection of T to plain text.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        String serialize(T t,
               SerializationContext context)
        Serialize T to plain text.
        Parameters:
        t - The object to be serialized
        context - Context of the serialization
        Returns:
        The object serialized.

      • serializeFromCollection

        String serializeFromCollection(Collection<T> c,
                             SerializationContext context)
        Serialize a collection of T to plain text.
        Parameters:
        c - The collection of the object to be serialized
        context - Context of the serialization
        Returns:
        The object serialized.
